caption: The video tells the story of several engines on the earth that move the Earth due to the violent earthquake, because of the earthquake, they were damaged and could not start. In space, the Earth is gradually drawn closer to Jupiter by its gravity. A space station was also put into a low-power state due to the failure. The father on the space station was not able to communicate in detail with the grandfather and son on Earth. The grandparent and grandson flee the natural disaster in their car and prepare to get to safety. They were stopped by a group of heavily armed soldiers who demanded that their vehicle be commandeered to maintain the engine.
